learning_outcomes: Recognize and reproduce the sounds of the Armenian alphabet.
Understand and use familiar everyday expressions and very basic phrases (e.g., greetings, introductions).
Introduce him/herself and others simply (e.g., Ես... եմ - I am...).
Ask and answer simple questions about personal details (name, nationality).
Interact in a very simple way if the other person speaks slowly, clearly, and is prepared to help.
Recognize familiar names, words, and very simple sentences in Armenian script.
language_focus_topics: The Armenian Alphabet (Հայոց այբուբեն): All 39 letters (including 'և'), their names, and sounds. Writing and reading practice.
Basic pronunciation rules: Voiced, voiceless, and aspirated consonants (basic distinctions). Vowel sounds.
Nouns: Concept of nouns. No grammatical gender. Nominative case singular (e.g., տուն - house, գիրք - book).
Pronouns: Personal pronouns in nominative singular (ես - I, դու - you (s.), նա - he/she/it).
Verbs: Present tense of 'եմ' (to be - auxiliary): եմ, ես, է. Simple sentence structure (e.g., Ես ուսանող եմ - I am a student).
Verbs: Present tense of a few common verbs in 1st/2nd/3rd person singular (e.g., ունեմ - I have, ուզում եմ - I want, խոսում եմ - I speak).
Basic Sentence Structure: Subject-Object-Verb (SOV) tendency. Simple statements.
Negation: 'չ-' prefix with verbs (e.g., չեմ ուզում - I don't want). 'չկա' (there isn't).
Simple Questions: Intonation. Basic question words (Ո՞վ - who, Ի՞նչ - what, Որտե՞ղ - where).

Day 1 Grammar - 'It is': Սա ի՞նչ է։ (What is it?), Սա ... է՞։ (Is it ...?), Սա ... է՞, թե՞ ...։ (Is it ... or ...?), Սա ... է։ (It is ...), Սա ... չէ։ (It is not ...), Սա ... չէ, այլ ... է։ (It is not ... but it is...).
vocabulary_topics: Day 1: Basic Words and Phrases: Բարև (hello), Ցտեսություն (goodbye), Այո (yes), Ոչ (no), Շնորհակալություն (thank you), Խնդրեմ (you're welcome/please), Լավ (alright/ok), Մեկ (one), Թեյ (tea), Սուրճ (coffee), Ջուր (water), Հյութ (juice), Գարեջուր (beer), Գինի (wine), Կանխիկ (cash), Քարտ (card).
Greetings: Բարև (Ձեզ), Ողջույն, Ցտեսություն, Առայժմ, Բարի լույս/օր/երեկո.
Introductions & Personal Information: Անունդ ինչպե՞ս է: Անունս... է: Շատ ուրախ եմ: Որտեղի՞ց ես: Ես...-ից եմ: Ազգություն (basic).
Colors: կարմիր, կապույտ, կանաչ, դեղին, սև, սպիտակ (basic).
Common Objects: գիրք, գրիչ, սեղան, աթոռ, տուն, մեքենա, հեռախոս.
Basic Food & Drink: հաց, ջուր, կաթ, սուրճ, թեյ, պանիր, խնձոր.
Classroom language: Կրկնեք, խնդրեմ: Չեմ հասկանում:

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.line: Բարև, սո՞ւրճ, թե՞ թեյ։ (Barev, surch, te tey?)

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.line: Ոչ, մեկ սուրճ, խնդրեմ։ (Voch, mek surch, khndrem.)

pronunciation_focus_topics: Mastering the sounds of all Armenian letters, including unique sounds not found in English.
Distinction between aspirated (թ, փ, ք, չ, ց), voiceless (տ, պ, կ, ճ, ծ), and voiced (դ, բ, գ, ջ, ձ) stops and affricates.
Pronunciation of vowels (ա, է, ե, ը, ի, о, ու, և).
Word stress (generally on the last syllable, but with exceptions).
Basic intonation for statements and simple questions.
listening_comprehension_skills: Recognize familiar Armenian words and very basic phrases when spoken slowly and clearly.
Understand simple greetings, introductions, and farewells.
Follow very simple, clearly articulated instructions.
reading_comprehension_skills: Read and identify all letters of the Armenian alphabet (print and basic handwritten).
Read and understand familiar names, words, and very simple sentences.
spoken_interaction_skills: Introduce oneself and ask for someone's name.
Ask and answer simple questions about personal information (name, origin).
spoken_production_skills: Say the letters of the Armenian alphabet.
Pronounce basic Armenian vocabulary comprehensibly, paying attention to distinct sounds.
Produce simple isolated phrases and sentences (e.g., 'Սա իմ գիրքն է' - This is my book).
written_interaction_skills: Recognize own name and a few familiar words when written.
written_production_skills: Write all letters of the Armenian alphabet (uppercase and lowercase).
Write one's name and other simple familiar words in Armenian.
Copy familiar words and short sentences.
cultural_competence_topics: Basic awareness of formal (Դուք - You pl./formal) vs. informal (դու - you s./informal) address.
Importance of hospitality in Armenian culture.
Key Armenian symbols (e.g., Mount Ararat, Armenian cross/khachkar - basic awareness).
learning_strategies_suggestions: Use flashcards with Armenian script, pictures, and transliteration (initially).
Listen to Armenian children's songs or simple audio designed for learners.
Focus on mastering the unique consonant sounds (aspirated, ejective-like voiceless).
